DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate AMG 162 in the treatment of bone loss in subjects undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer.
DOC.brief_title: AMG 162 in the Treatment of Bone Loss in Subjects Undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer
DOC.keyword: Treatment of bone loss in patients undergoing androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) for non-metastatic prostate cancer (PC).
